nmrglue.process.proc_base.zf_pad¶

nmrglue.process.proc_base.zf_pad(data, pad=0, mid=False)¶

Zero Fill with pad zeros

Parameters: * data Array of spectral data. * pad Number of zeros to add. * mid Set to True to zero fill in middle of data.

returns ndarray object
